markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Pteranodon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3151)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Pteranodons are quick and agile reptiles with 20-foot wingspans that enable them to hover on wind currents for hours. These creatures have long beaks and equally long crests that protrude from the backs of their heads.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Pteranodon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3151)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 278 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +8; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=371)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 25

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +10,
**Damage** 1d10+3 piercing

**Swoop** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The pteranodon [Flies](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312)up to its Speed and makes one beak Strike at any point during that movement.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-459" />
name: Pteranodon
